category.name: Test Case 5, Follows, Parent, Modifies, Uses for multiple procedures

id.comment: Is statement 3 following any other statement?

query.querystr: assign a; select a such that Follows(a, 3);

id.comment: Is statement 3 a child of any statement?

query.querystr: stmt s; select s such that Parent(s, 3);

id.comment: Is our while loop using b?

query.querystr: while w; select w such that Uses(w, "b")

id.comment: Is statement 3 followed by other statements?

query.querystr: stmt s; select s such that Follows(3, s);

id.comment: Is variable b modified by any while loop?

query.querystr: while w; select w such that Modifies(w, "b");

id.comment: Is variable b modified by any statements?

query.querystr: stmt s; select s such that Modifies(s, "b");

id.comment: Which is/are the child/grandchild of statement 1?

query.querystr: stmt s; select s such that Parent*(1, s);
stmt s; select s such that Follows*(1, s);
stmt s; select s such that Follows*(3, s);
stmt s; select s such that Modifies(s, "a");
stmt s; select s such that Uses(s, "a");
stmt s; select s such that Uses(s, "z");
